132.movie_plot: An unimpressive, every-day man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

138.movie_name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie (1995)

110.movie_plot: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

8.movie_plot: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

65.movie_plot: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

86.movie_plot: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

17.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)

57.movie_plot: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.
